text: "Young Girl" is a 1968 song by Gary Puckett & The Union Gap and is the title track to second studio album Young Girl. It went to number 1 in Canada, Ireland, New Zealand and the United Kingdom and number 2 in Australia, South Africa and the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1968 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Gary Puckett & The Union Gap songs
title: Young Girl (song)
